name: Superline Hotami
description:
Clearly inspired by a select two games, you embark as Yellow Sphere on a mission to remove the Red Guys.

Hopefully Yellow Sphere can do this in under 10 seconds.

It's recommended to use the desktop binaries for a larger window.

Attribution:

  • Unity
  • DOTween
  • "A Better Unity WebGL Template"
  • Staatiliches
  • Bosca Ceoli
